DOC.brief_title: Move Feel Good : Effects Intensive Physical Training Brain Plasticity , Cognition Psychological Well-being .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator wish document benefit intensive exercise program youth aim identify effective program improve psychological well-being , especially reduce depressive anxiety symptom improve self-esteem . This study target participant age 9 30 year included education program ( 4th Grade undergraduate university college ) . The investigator propose perform prospective , randomize , clinical study involve participant mood disorder ( International Classification Diseases , 10th Revision , Clinical Modification ( ICD-10-CM ) medical coding : ICD-10-CM F32.9 ) , anxiety ( ICD-10-CM F41.9 ) , specific learn disability ( ADHD hyperactivity ( ICD-10-CM F90.2 ) , dyslexia-dyscalculia-dyspraxia ( ICD-10-CM F81.0 , F81.2 , F81.81 ) ) healthy subject equally distribute confound variable ( age , gender , subclinical depressive symptom ) . The participant enrol either experimental , intensive aerobic exercise regime active control activity stretch relaxation conduct parallel . The effect program assess ) psychological symptom , use questionnaire , ii ) cognitive function , particularly attention skill executive function , neuropsychological task , iii ) physical ability ( physical testing ) . To investigate therapeutic value exercise prevention depressive anxiety symptom treatment mood disorder young student necessity impose current outbreak depression among adolescent young people school . To promote exercise medicine base level evidence specific domain , rigorous experimental study must perform . Depending result , medical imaging propose participant end behavioral study . This functional magnetic resonance image physiological activation condition ( perform behavioral task Stroop task suit subject 's age ) , perform intensive physical training .
